academicProjects.title: Multi-product Demand Forecasting in Dynamic Environments
academicProjects.description: Master's thesis implementing comprehensive forecasting approaches including StemGNN for correlation analysis and Change Point Detection for demand shifts
academicProjects.impact: Improved forecast accuracy by 35% in dynamic environments

academicProjects.title: Formal Employment Classification with Concept Drift
academicProjects.description: Analyzed pre/post-pandemic employment trends using DANE GEIH survey data and Chi-Square tests to identify distributional changes
academicProjects.impact: Identified significant distributional changes with 92% accuracy

academicProjects.title: GA-BNN Model for News Classification
academicProjects.description: Developed Bayesian Neural Network optimized with Genetic Algorithm for hyperparameter tuning
